name: Putrescent Slime
description: The Putrescent Slime is a medium, amorphous ooze with a putrid appearance, capable of slipping through tight spaces with ease.
memorable: Its stench can poison unsuspecting creatures nearby, and it can effortlessly navigate through narrow passages.
goals: Ambush prey and control battlefields using its toxic abilities.
relations: May be found alongside other oozes or in hazardous, decaying environments.
environment: Dark, damp places, often where decay and filth accumulate.
strengths: Immunities to acid and poison, and the ability to maneuver through narrow spaces.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and poor armor class, making it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Pseudopod attack delivers a mix of bludgeoning and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Stench ability poisons creatures within proximity, posing a tactical challenge.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet allows it to sense its surroundings without sight.
additional_information: Constitution of 16 provides substantial durability in combat.
Intelligence and Charisma scores indicate it is a mindless creature.
The slime is immune to several conditions such as blinded and frightened.
It can affect multiple creatures with its Stench ability.
The slime relies on ambush tactics rather than strategy.
test_queries: slime that moves through tight spaces
medium ooze with high hit points
